snippet: State Rep. Wayne Schmidt has picked up support from an unlikely source in a closely watched battle for an open Senate seat in northern Michigan: his opponent's mom....

headline.print_headline: Michigan Lawmaker's Mom Supports Primary Opponent
headline.main: Michigan Lawmaker's Mom Supports Primary Opponent

lead_paragraph: State Rep. Wayne Schmidt has picked up support from an unlikely source in a closely watched battle for an open Senate seat in northern Michigan: his opponent's mom.
